# preferredMIMEType

**Instance Property**

The preferred MIME type for the type.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredMIMEType: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

If available, the preferred (first available) tag of class [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTagClass/mimeType]. If not `nil`, the value of this property is the best available MIME type value for this type.

The value of this property is equivalent to, but more efficient than:

```swift
type.tags[.mimeType]?.first
```

## Obtaining tags

- **preferredFilenameExtension**: The preferred filename extension for the type.
- **tags**: The tag specification dictionary of the type.
